publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3759.1 Donald Gorrie: Dealing with Young Offenders—As an amendment to motion (S1M-3759) in the name of Christine Grahame, leave out from "considers" to end and insert "believes that the Scottish Executive should respond to these recommendations and take urgent action to remedy these defects."

S1M-3759.1 Donald Gorrie: Dealing with Young Offenders-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3759) in the name of Christine Grahame, leave out from "considers" to end and insert "believes that the Scottish Executive should respond to these recommendations and take urgent action to remedy these defects."
S1M-3759.1 Dealing with Young Offenders (lodged on 13 January 2003) Nora Radcliffe*

S1M-3759.1 Donald Gorrie: Dealing with Young Offenders—As an amendment to motion (S1M-3759) in the name of Christine Grahame, leave out from "considers" to end and insert "believes that the Scottish Executive should respond to these recommendations and take urgent action to remedy these defects." Supported by: Nora Radcliffe
